comments: Universally, students thought Prof. Cadman was “amusing” and “energetic”. One student asked: “is it weird that I look forward to Accounting every week?” While it may be very difficult to make Accounting “come alive”, Prof. Cadman succeeded.  A dozen students called Prof. Cadman “the best teacher I have had at Wharton!”  “This is the quality of course I would expect from paying $40K a year,” said one reviewer.  Students noted the professor’s accessibility, and willingness to meet outside of class to discuss problems.  The difficulty of the curve was noted as the only downside to the course.
